a.span:
Take a tour
Tomar un Excursion

div.div: See what teaching positions we currently have open!
We are an open-enrollment charter school in the Kenilworth subdivision.
You can make the difference in the lives of our children.

div.class: hero-custom-foot-container container is-wide is-flex is-justify-content-space-between is-align-items-center

section.class: view-check section section-36759 is-events is-events is-tertiary has-border-bottom-tertiary-dark has-pt3 has-pb3 section-2

div.div: Currently, we are in the fourth week of the Distance Learning Program and will continue for five more weeks. We appreciate your hard work during these hard times and will continue to make up lost instructional time and provide some sense of normalcy for our students. Our teachers will continue working from home to lead this learning, and we expect our students to complete their work from home.

Please click the link below to find all of the important information, resources and links for distance learning.
Click here for details

div.h3: Distance Learning Ways Parents Can Help
div.div: Parents: Here are some ways to help your student while we are utilizing distance learning.
